concept.title: Clustering: Testing multicast connectivity between servers in a cluster
concept.shortdesc: You can use the omping tool to test basic multicast connectivity between servers in a cluster.

conbody.p: The omping tool is available in the omping package that is provided with the base operating system. The tool allows you to test basic multicast connectivity between the servers in a cluster. For more information about the omping tool, read the man page.
See for information about using the omping tool on .
